description: The app does not work, so I am leary of its actual use, security wise...
summary: Rotate your pw and key after use

description:
This thing is awesome!!
The sleek gtk/4 ui integrates perfectly into the Gnome DE and is a plug n play for autofill EVEN ON THE FLATPAK!
I use this application on both my laptop and my desktop and it has never failed me in my usage.
I would very highly reccomend using this beutifull application over the stock bitwarden flatpak/binary.
summary: Best Bitwarden client ive seen yet!

description: Setup on Fedora is overly complex compared to simply installing the repo RPM. Logins with valid credentials fail for mysterious reasons and CLI tools then required for setup or config aren't easily accessible from the Flatpak.
summary: Flatpak not ready for regular use

description: This Bitwarden Client is easy to set up, fast and feature packed with biometric authentication.

The app was buggy and couldn't login. But the development is admirable but also questionable. 

What happens if this developer gets hacked and starts to leak users' passwords? This software needs to be independantly verified for security.
